user.title: Goal Zero Yeti
user.description:
First, you need to download the Goal Zero app: https://www.goalzero.com/product-features/yeti-app/

Follow the instructions to connect your Yeti to your Wifi network. Then get the host ip from your router. DHCP must be set up in your router settings for the device to ensure the host ip does not change. Refer to your router's user manual.

error.cannot_connect: Error connecting to host. This is likely not the Yeti you are looking for.
error.connect_timeout: Connection to Yeti has timed out
